original_text: And he said, The Jews have agreed to desire thee that thou wouldest bring down Paul to morrow into the council, as though they would enquire somewhat of him more perfectly.
korean_text: 대답하되 유대인들이 공모하기를 그들이 바울에 대하여 더 자세한 것을 묻기 위함이라 하고 내일 그를 데리고 공회로 내려오기를 당신께 청하자 하였으니

sentences.original_text: The Jews have agreed to desire thee
that thou wouldest bring down Paul to morrow
as though they would enquire somewhat
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 그들이 무언가를 묻고 싶은 것처럼
